summary: A command‑line utility that reads a collection of prompts, queries large language models (OpenAI or Anthropic) to obtain their completions, optionally retries on failures, processes entries in parallel, and records the generated responses to a JSON file while optionally logging to Weights & Biases.
business_intent: Automate the generation of model outputs for evaluation datasets, enabling large‑scale benchmarking of LLMs across different providers.
